sentence.Network_en: The fear was of a repeat of the racial violence that has marred past Guyanese elections.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们担心会再次出现像上次破坏了圭亚那大选那样的种族暴力事件.

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Guyana
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Guyana or its inhabitants;

auth_sentence.content: Many Guyanese seek their fortunes outside the country; the exodus of skilled migrants is among the highest in the region.
